hdu1.description:
Contains an entry for every star in the data release.  Relays information
about the combined spectrum and derived quantities for each DR star, in
particular, radial velocity values, stellar atmospheric parameters, and individual element abundances as determined from ASPCAP analysis.

APSTAR_ID.name: APSTAR_ID
APSTAR_ID.description: Unique apStar identifier: apogee.[ns].[sc].APSTAR_VERS.LOC.STAR, where [ns] is for APOGEE North/South, [sc] is for survey/commissioning

TARGET_ID.name: TARGET_ID
TARGET_ID.description: NB: description not found. Needs update

AK_TARG_METHOD.description: Method used to get targetting extinction

APOGEE_TARGET1.name: APOGEE_TARGET1
APOGEE_TARGET1.description: Bitwise OR of first APOGEE-1 target flag of all visits, see bitmask definitions.

APOGEE_TARGET2.description: Bitwise OR of second APOGEE-1 target flag of all visits, see bitmask definitions

TARGFLAGS.description: Verbose/text form of APOGEE-1 target flags

NVISITS.name: NVISITS
NVISITS.description: Number of visits into combined spectrum

COMMISS.name: COMMISS
COMMISS.description: Set to 1 for APOGEE-1 Commissioning data (before July 2011), else 0

SNR.name: SNR
SNR.description: median S/N per pixel in combined frame (at apStar sampling)

STARFLAG.name: STARFLAG
STARFLAG.description: Flag for star condition taken from bitwise OR of individual visits, see bitmask definitions

ANDFLAG.name: ANDFLAG
ANDFLAG.description: Flag for star condition taken from bitwise AND of individual visits, see bitmask definitions

VHELIO_AVG.description: Average radial velocity, weighted by S/N, using RVs determined from cross-correlation of individual spectra with combined spectrum

VSCATTER.description: Scatter of individual visit RVs around average

VERR.description: Uncertainty in VHELIO_AVG from the S/N-weighted individual RVs

VERR_MED.name: VERR_MED
VERR_MED.description: Median of individual visit RV errors

SYNTHVHELIO_AVG.name: SYNTHVHELIO_AVG
SYNTHVHELIO_AVG.description: Average RV from synthetic spectrum template matching technique

SYNTHVSCATTER.name: SYNTHVSCATTER
SYNTHVSCATTER.description: Scatter of individual visit synthethic RVs around average

SYNTHVERR.name: SYNTHVERR
SYNTHVERR.description: S/N weighted, pipeline-reported error in the synthetic RV's

SYNTHVERR_MED.description: Median of individual visit synthetic RV errors

RV_CCFWHM.description: FWHM of cross-correlation peak from combined vs best-match synthetic spectrum

RV_AUTOFWHM.description: FWHM of auto-correlation of best-match synthetic spectrum

SYNTHSCATTER.name: SYNTHSCATTER
SYNTHSCATTER.description: scatter between RV using combined spectrum and RV using synthetic spectrum

hdu2.description:
Provides RA-indexed array giving index in HDU1 corresponding to each degree in RA, e.g., ARRAY[90] gives the index in HDU1 of first object with RA>90 degrees.
This HDU has no non-standard required keywords.
Data: FITS image

hdu3.description:
Provides detailed information about the contents of the PARAM and ELEM arrays in HDU1 that is common to all data release stars.
This HDU has no non-standard required keywords.
Data: FITS image

PARAM_SYMBOL.name: PARAM_SYMBOL
PARAM_SYMBOL.description: Gives order of parameters for PARAM and FPARAM arrays in HDU1

ELEM_SYMBOL.name: ELEM_SYMBOL
ELEM_SYMBOL.description: Gives order of elements for X_H, X_M and FELEM arrays in HDU1

ELEM_VALUE.name: ELEM_VALUE
ELEM_VALUE.description: Gives nature of values in FELEM arrays in HDU1, i.e. [X/H] or [X/M]

ELEMTOH.name: ELEMTOH
ELEMTOH.description: Set to 1 for FELEM array element that is relative to H, 0 if relative to M (note caveat for C and N, which are relative to H in the dwarf grids)

CLASSES.name: CLASSES
CLASSES.description: Gives order of classes in FPARAM_CLASS arrays in HDU1

hdu1.description:
Contains an entry for every star in the data release.  Relays information
about the combined spectrum and derived quantities for each DR star, in
particular, radial velocity values, stellar atmospheric parameters, and individual element abundances as determined from ASPCAP analysis.

hdu2.description:
Provides RA-indexed array giving index in HDU1 corresponding to each degree in RA, e.g., ARRAY[90] gives the index in HDU1 of first object with RA>90 degrees.
This HDU has no non-standard required keywords.
Data: FITS image

hdu3.description:
Provides detailed information about the contents of the PARAM and ELEM arrays in HDU1 that is common to all data release stars.
This HDU has no non-standard required keywords.
Data: FITS image
